channel.title: [dedi hosted] runewars || 24/7-no lag || webclient || amazing exp rates!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RuneWars_zps8e063392.jpg[/img]
[b][size=3][url=http://www.chaoticrealm.co.uk/home.php][u]Click Here To Play Webclient![/u][/url][/size] [size=3][url=http://www.chaoticrealm.co.uk/home.php][u]Click Here For The Forums![/u][/url][/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/combat_zps1f13ed3e.png[/img][b][u][size=4]Why Pick RuneWars?[/COLOR][/b][/u][/size][IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/rc_zpsbb88458d.png[/img] [b]Simply 1 REASON.[/b] Every server gives the same story saying how they offer new and updated features and exclusive gameplay or even a great economy. Sadly 6 out of 10 times when you log on the economy etc. is ruined or everyone has the limit edition items which ruins the server's motivation to gain items. [B]Here at Runewars we 100% guarantee the server to be and to have the following:[/B]
[B][size=2]-Challenging and worth your time. Skillcapes should be an achievement and not extremely easy to get. -Amazing exp rates. We ensure our players feel proud of getting a 99.[/COLOR] -Amazing Minigames such as working Dominion Tower and Nazi Zombies also Amazing quests. -Player Voices Heard; We love your ideas. Runewars is everyones server and we'll do anything to improve/ make it your favourite server. -Constant updates and fixed. We'll do anything it takes to keep our players satisfied. -100% professional and mature responses also 100% help from staff. No matter how silly your questions we will remain professional and give detailed answers and our best assistance. -Fun activities and player involvement. Constant competitions and events to win ingame goodies and also real life goodies!
[code] -Fully Working Herblore ( Overloads and Extremes Makeable!! ) -Steadfast Boots, Ragefire Boots, Glaiven Boots -Multiple Bosses to fight -Many Minigames to take part in -Multiple Monster teleports to train at -Normal and Advanced Skilling areas -Fully Working Spirit Shields ( With Effects ) -Perfect switching, items won't move around inventory -All weapons, specials, armor working 100% -24/7 Linux Dedicated Server -Working Summoning pets and familiars -Great support team and staff. -Active Owners -Constant Updates -Working Teleblock -100% UPTIME! -NO LAG -Professional Website -STABLE ECONOMY[/code]
Media: [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/Tutorial_zps12fbf32e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/DominionTower_zps54ec649a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/avatar_zps11a4fec5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/everlasting_zpsaa78a987.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/nomad_zps3eed74d9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/pest_zps9913f7a4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/PyramidPlunder_zpsb9c5ac89.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/skillzone_zps9c25e100.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/farming_zps9fb0254b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/constrctionn_zps8bfab5b4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i860.photobucket.com/albums/ab168/Ds_Sigshop/RW%20ADVERT/fletchingdhide_zpse747494f.png[/img]
What to do now? [b][size=3][url=http://www.chaoticrealm.co.uk/home.php][u]Play Runewars![/u][/url][/size][/b]

item.description:
@cheesepizza1337 wrote:

[center]

RuneWars_zps8e063392.jpg950×300

[size=3]Click Here To Play Webclient![/size]
[size=3]Click Here For The Forums![/size]

[u][size=4]Why Pick RuneWars?[/COLOR][/u][/size]
Simply 1 REASON. Every server gives the same story saying how they offer new and updated features and exclusive gameplay or even a great economy. Sadly 6 out of 10 times when you log on the economy etc. is ruined or everyone has the limit edition items which ruins the server’s motivation to gain items. Here at Runewars we 100% guarantee the server to be and to have the following:

[B][size=2]-Challenging and worth your time. Skillcapes should be an achievement and not extremely easy to get.
-Amazing exp rates. We ensure our players feel proud of getting a 99.[/COLOR]
-Amazing Minigames such as working Dominion Tower and Nazi Zombies also Amazing quests.
-Player Voices Heard; We love your ideas. Runewars is everyones server and we’ll do anything to improve/ make it your favourite server.
-Constant updates and fixed. We’ll do anything it takes to keep our players satisfied.
-100% professional and mature responses also 100% help from staff. No matter how silly your questions we will remain professional and give detailed answers and our best assistance.
-Fun activities and player involvement. Constant competitions and events to win ingame goodies and also real life goodies!

-Fully Working Herblore ( Overloads and Extremes Makeable!! ) -Steadfast Boots, Ragefire Boots, Glaiven Boots -Multiple Bosses to fight -Many Minigames to take part in -Multiple Monster teleports to train at -Normal and Advanced Skilling areas -Fully Working Spirit Shields ( With Effects ) -Perfect switching, items won't move around inventory -All weapons, specials, armor working 100% -24/7 Linux Dedicated Server -Working Summoning pets and familiars -Great support team and staff. -Active Owners -Constant Updates -Working Teleblock -100% UPTIME! -NO LAG -Professional Website -STABLE ECONOMY

Media:










What to do now?

[/center]
